H0.text: What company is the world's largest private employer. Amazon

H1.text: What company is the world's largest private employer. McDonald's

H2.text: What company is the world's largest private employer. IBM

H3.text: What company is the world's largest private employer. WalMart

A4.text: Walmart is also the largest private employer in the world, with 2.1 million employees.

A5.text: Walmart employs almost five times as many people as IBM, the second-largest employer.
